children.value: Open the Client GUI and select
to open the form for creating a new key.
: The name of the new Key.

: Optional password to protect the key. Note: If you configure a
password each time the client makes a connection to the server you will be asked to
re-enter this password.

: Leave as RSA Access: Select if you would like all users of the Client
machine to be able to use this key to authenticate with the Server.
displayed in the lower pane of the SSH Keys window.

mkdir /home/asp1/.ssh
touch /home/asp1/.ssh/authorized_keys
chown -R asp1:asp1 ~/.ssh
chmod 700 ~/.ssh
chmod 600 ~/.ssh/authorized_keys
